Pre-Game Insights: Sanju Samson is ruled out of the series after getting injured in the first match in Mumbai.
Middle-order batter Rahul Tripathi is likely to be in the XI for the second T20I.
Vidarbha wicketkeeper-batter Jitesh Sharma has been called as Samson's replacement.
Ruturaj Gaikwad is another local player vying for inclusion in the team.
Shubman Gill will try to make amends for his forgettable debut at Wankhede.
Shivam Mavi will try to build onto his 4-22 performance from the first match.
Umran Malik will have to practice caution with his pace at the batting-friendly strip of Gahunje.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India and Sri Lanka have both won one game each at the MCA Stadium in Gahunje.
